s1.title: FOP extensions to xsl:fo
s1.p: Sometimes it is desirable to have extensions to xsl:fo in order to support some feature of the output format which isn't covered by the xsl:fo specification. To use the Fop extensions, you need to add a namespace entry for http://xml.apache.org/fop/extensions on the root element.
